name: War Zone: Army Shooting Battle
description:
Are you ready for an everlasting action and territorial shooting war? Get your guns ready and be equipped to pull the trigger at your enemies.


CLEAR THE BASE

Load the guns and get ready to clear all the base areas where enemies are trying to conquer. Locate your target on an on-screen GPS locator and be a legendary shooter. Take cover in alleys so that you can dodge the enemy’s eye. Point the gun towards the explosive drums to cause an explosion to beat the rivals down.


REWARDS & GAMEPLAY

You can earn rewards by watching videos. Double your level coins by watching videos and unlock new guns. Do not forget to collect new guns after defeating an enemy. Unlock all levels by watching multiple ads. Spend your coins to unlock new weapons & guns. Hold on to the trigger tight so you can get the enemy before they can get you. THIS IS WAR!! The gameplay of this game is very simple yet interesting. The environments vary according to the playing modes. Do not forget to collect daily rewards.


GAME PLAYING MODES

Pick a mode that will give you a unique environment to start this ultimate shooting arena battle.
The game has the following playing modes:


DUSTOWN:

This mode has a deserted alley camp simulated background environment. Your enemies will join the base through a plane. Target enemies, run around and locate them through an on-screen GPS locator. Shoot them before they shoot you and unlock new guns after defeating each enemy. The war has begun, join in this extreme action-adventure along the dusty town streets.


CITY OF SIN:

Locate enemies in the icy city on-screen GPS locator and shoot. Collect guns after defeating enemies. Be a part of snowcapped alleys shooting battle. Clear the area of enemies and complete all the levels to win. Repent the sins by killing bad rivals covering your area.


SQUAD:

Locate enemies and shoot them down, get as many headshots as you can to defeat enemies in an abandoned alley. The entire enemy squad has brought the war to you. They have covered your area and it is up to you how you rid it of them. Strike first and hide to protect yourself. Keep your bullets loaded and take excellent shots to win.


Multiplayer Mode:

This game also has a multiplayer mode. Select an environment to play in, play along with other players as a team, and beat the opponents. This team vs. team multiplayer shooting combat will keep you hooked to the game. Target all the enemies and be a team player while covering your players from shots.


War Zone: Army Shooting Battle Features:

-On-screen GPS locator to locate the target
- Easy to use UI controls that make shooting at enemies easy
-Excellent background environment along with smooth gameplay to engage
-Multiple playing modes are available
-Option to play as a team war hero in multiplayer mode
-Customize your gun by unlocking more
-Daily reward coins and level winning rewards
-High-quality graphics with a realistic simulation of base camp shooting battle
